com.xamoom.android

Class XamoomEndUserApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xamoom.android.XamoomEndUserApi

  • public class XamoomEndUserApi
extends java.lang.Object
    Use XamoomEndUserApi to communicate with the xamoom-cloud-api. For every call use the XamoomEndUserApi.getInstance() and add a method. Every method has an APICallBack to return the result. For more information visit us on github: https://github.com/xamoom/xamoom-android-sdk

      • getSystemLanguage

        public java.lang.String getSystemLanguage()

      • getContentbyIdFull

        public void getContentbyIdFull(java.lang.String contentId,
                               boolean style,
                               boolean menu,
                               java.lang.String language,
                               boolean full,
                               APICallback<ContentById> callback)
        Returns the content with a specific contentId. With full = true you get every contentBlock. If full = false unsynchronised contents wont be send.
        Parameters:
        contentId - Content id of an xamoom content.
        style - True for returning xamoom style, else false.
        menu - True for returning xamoom menu, else false.
        language - The language for the response (if available on xamoom-cloud), else systemLanguage. For german: "de". If null == systemLanguage.
        full - Boolean determining to get the full content or not
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ContentById, Style, Menu

      • getContentByLocationIdentifier

        public void getContentByLocationIdentifier(java.lang.String locationIdentifier,
                                           java.lang.String iBeaconMajor,
                                           boolean style,
                                           boolean menu,
                                           java.lang.String language,
                                           APICallback<ContentByLocationIdentifier> callback)
        Returns the content connected to a locationIdentifier (QR or NFC).
        Parameters:
        locationIdentifier - LocationIdentifier from the scanned QR, NFC or iBeacons minor. (Eddystone - only send the locationIdentifier)
        iBeaconMajor - Major id from an iBeacon.
        style - True for returning xamoom style, else false.
        menu - True for returning xamoom menu, else false.
        language - The language for the response (if available on xamoom-cloud), else systemLanguage. For german: "de". If null == systemLanguage.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ContentByLocationIdentifier, Style, Menu

      • getContentByLocation

        public void getContentByLocation(double lat,
                                 double lon,
                                 java.lang.String language,
                                 APICallback<ContentByLocation> callback)
        Returns a list of contents in a 40 meter radius.
        Parameters:
        lat - The latitude of a location (for example user location).
        lon - The longitude of a location (for example user location).
        language - The language for the response (if available on xamoom-cloud), else systemLanguage. For german: "de". If null == systemLanguage.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ContentByLocation

      • queueGeofenceAnalytics

        public void queueGeofenceAnalytics(java.lang.String requestedLanguage,
                                   java.lang.String deliveredLanguage,
                                   java.lang.String systemId,
                                   java.lang.String systemName,
                                   java.lang.String contentId,
                                   java.lang.String contentName,
                                   java.lang.String spotId,
                                   java.lang.String spotName)
        Geofence analytics, call when displaying a getContentByLocation().
        Parameters:
        requestedLanguage - The language you requested.
        deliveredLanguage - The returned language.
        systemId - The returned systemId.
        systemName - The returned systemName.
        contentId - The returned contentId.
        contentName - The returned contentName.
        spotId - The returned spotId.
        spotName - The returned spotName.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getContentByLocation(double, double, String, APICallback)

      • getSpotMap

        public void getSpotMap(java.lang.String systemId,
                       java.lang.String[] mapTags,
                       java.lang.String language,
                       APICallback<SpotMap> callback)
        Returns a list of spots. For example for a map.
        Parameters:
        systemId - When calling with an API Key, can be 0.
        mapTags - StringArray with mapTags you want to display.
        language - The language for the response (if available on xamoom-cloud), else systemLanguage. For german: "de". If null == systemLanguage.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        SpotMap

      • getClosestSpots

        public void getClosestSpots(double lat,
                            double lon,
                            java.lang.String language,
                            int radius,
                            int limit,
                            APICallback<SpotMap> callback)
        Returns a list of spots near a location with a radius.
        Parameters:
        lat - The latitude of a location (for example user location).
        lon - The longitude of a location (for example user location).
        language - The language for the response (if available on xamoom-cloud), else systemLanguage. For german: "de". If null == systemLanguage.
        radius - A search radius in meter
        limit - A limit for results
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        SpotMap

      • getContentList

        public void getContentList(java.lang.String language,
                           int pageSize,
                           java.lang.String cursor,
                           java.lang.String[] tags,
                           APICallback<ContentList> callback)
        Returns a list of contents ordered desc of specific tags.
        Parameters:
        language - The language for the response (if available), else systemLanguage.
        pageSize - Number of returned items.
        cursor - Send for paging, else null.
        tags - Tags to filter.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ContentList
